transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ha sir wo call drop ho gayi thi.
Customer: Ha boliye.
Executive: Aap kuch puch rahe the ek question aapka aur tha wo kuch galat lead aati hai jo. To moong dal maine hata diya hai moong dal ki category lagi thi. Jo ki normal dal jo hoti hai na sir uski lead aa rahi thi aapke paas.
Customer: Ha aise bhi bahut kuch hai aur aise hai.
Executive: To jab mujhe jab aapko wo dikhe na tab fir mujhe wo mai keh to raha hu mujhe whatsapp karna aap same time mein.
Isse kya hoga mai turant hi wo sahi kar paunga jab bhi jab bhi aapko koi galat lead dikhti hai.
Abhi koi dikh rahi hai kya? Bataiye. 
Customer: Ek cheez ek cheez jaan kar lijiye. Ha. Bol rahe the agar hum logo ko jo leads milta hai jaise ki 30 din ka, theek hai? 
Executive: Ha sir.
Customer: 30 din ka jo lead milta hai.
Executive: Achha ek week mein aapko hum logo ko 30 matlab 30 leads dete hai. 30 buyleads weekly hai do buyleads daily basis pe hai sir.
Customer: Daily do aur 30 weekly.
Executive: Ha sir. To usko hum humko jaise pata hoga ki ye lead hum log aap log diye hai ye lead wagera.
Executive: Mai samjha nahi sir fir se puchiyega.
Customer: Agar yaha pe week mein do week mein 30 to do week liye dete hai. Iska matlab kya hota hai jo lead aate hai hum week mein do matlab per day do leads do lead aap use kar sakte ho. Ha do dekho do to use aapko karne hi hai daily basis pe aur jo jo kitni dete hai 30 dete hai na usme se bhi weekly mein aapko use karna hai.
Achha jo leads aata hai ye humko jo do diye matlab humko do contact view kar sakte hai ye theek hai to? 
Executive: Ha detail nikalne ke liye ki buyer ki detail nikalne ke liye. Achha to wo hum logo ka bhi aise hota tha hum log customer ko dete the 30 leads teen mahine mein aise usse jyada ha. Achha theek hai.
Executive: Dekho sir weekly weekly hai yaha pe jyada hi cheez aa rahi hai. Kyuki dekho hame bhi pata hai bahut sare buyer inquiry kar rahe hai ya kuch kuch kar rahe hai to aap logo ka jo hai chances badhe hai na business nikalne ka isliye jyada aapko. Ye jo leads matlab de rahe hai ye jo mahine mein na week mein jo 30 leads de rahe hai ye matlab aap matlab customer de rahe hai ya fir hum logo ka khali number show hoga itna ka jo contact details show hoga yahi. 
Executive: Number abhi to sir ye aisa hai ki aapko IndiaMART de rahi hai lead taki jo naye buyers ka lead yaha pe post ho to aap in leads se usko open kar sako unki details. Achha achha theek hai. Hai na? Kyuki aise to dikhta nahi hai lead pe. Achha sir ye pura account aap hi handle kar rahe ho na sir? Ye jo mail id hai mail id hai IndiaMART pe mujhe nahi pata kya naam se hoga KCS power ho sakta hai my dear. 
Customer: KCS power power. 
Executive: Ha to us pe ye aapke paas login hai? 
Customer: Ha login hai. 
Executive: Achha theek hai theek hai kyuki mai abhi feedback close karunga to mere regarding aap satisfied aap. 
Customer: Theek hai wo ek aur ek cheez bolna chahunga hum abhi item upload kiye hai theek hai. 
Executive: Bataiye bataiye. Theek hai. Ye jo item upload kiye hai usme mai ek item ko dekhna chahunga. 
Customer: Bataiye bataiye.
Customer: Kuch kuch item hum side mein jab upload kiye na to unka matlab hum jo upload kiye hai wo show nahi ho raha hai purane version preview mein hum dekhte hai to purane wala jo hota hai wahi milta hai hum log jab update kiye hai wo nahi show hota hai wo kya time lagta hai update. 
Executive: Isiliye to. Isiliye to mai keh raha hu sir jo bhi jaha pe dikkat ho aap mujhe screenshot share karo taki mai usko actual mein study karke dekh saku ki aapne kya kiya tha aur kya nahi ho pa raha hai. Achha hum kuch kuch item update kiye hai usme dekho abhi ek item 250 gram shyam bakshi tikha tadka theek hai? 
Customer: Kya naam hai sir uska? 
Executive: 250 gram shyam bakshi likha hua hai shyam bakshi. 50 gram shyam boxi tikha tadka bataiye zara. 
Customer: Yahi usme hum abhi teen photo hai theek hai. Kya cheez hai? 
Executive: Teen photo dale hai theek hai teen photo dala hai aapne theek hai. Ha. Bas customer preview jab marte hai waha pe jo hum photo pehle ka jo photo hum already usko exit kar chuke hai wahi show ho raha hai. Wo kya time lagta hai update. 
Executive: Kis jagah pe kis jagah pe nahi sir dekho yaha pe seller panel mein to mai samajh gaya dusri jagah kaha bata rahe hai aap? 
Customer: Dusri matlab jaha pe preview mein dekhte hai preview customer ko jo view hoga customer ko jo view hoga jo preview hota hai na jaise ki score ke side mein jo aankh wala preview. 
Executive: Achha achha preview dekhta hu mai ek minute.
Executive: Preview se nahi matlab hai isko chhodo abhi aap ye dekho ye apne website mein jaake dekho samajhiyega ab aap jo aapka shyam namkeen dot in hai theek hai hum waha jaake isko search karta hu 250 gram. 
Customer: Waha pe bhi hum aur ek cheez shyamnamkeen.in pe abhi hum ek cheez dekha abhi to confirm nahi ho pa raha hu fir bhi hum kuch kuch item changes mein dekh rahe hai dekho shyamnamkeen.in mein ek special khatta meetha 49 per type ke rupees likha hua hai. Theek hai na? 
Executive: Hmm. 
Customer: Usko to hum change karenge. Ha usko change karne ke baad hi hum matlab hum bhi usme kuch changes dekh rahe hai. 
Executive: Uska bhi changes karte ho na sab change ho jata hai. Jyada time lagega to 24 ghanta lagega. Bahut jyada time lagega to 24 ghanta lagega isse jyada time nahi lagta hai usko approve hone mein. Achha changes hone mein. Thoda soch lena bhai sab changes ho jayega. Changes hua hai kuch shyam ji ek changes nahi hai. Mera premium likha hua hai. Kuch kuch item hai jaise ki hum change karne ke baad preview mein na same show nahi ho raha hai. 
Executive: Previews previews kyu dekh rahe hai sir preview se koi matlab nahi hai aap website pe jaake direct dekhiye na. Achha. Ha preview mein isliye dekhte hai kyuki yaha pe jo update hai na customer jo view hota hai customer ke paas wahi hum usko hum dekh rahe hai theek hai. 
Executive: Nahi nahi wo preview aapke kaam ka nahi hai seedhe jaake website kholega aapka buyer ki wo aapka aake seller panel mein preview karega? 
Customer: Seller nahi nahi wo to preview hum log dekh rahe hai agar koi us page aapka hum logo ka open karega hum log ka click karega uska details to show hoga. Jaise ki hum primary photo dete hai usme.

Executive: Ek kaam aur kariye aap inactive products mein jitne product hai na delete kar dijiye.
Customer: Theek theek hai theek hai. 
Executive: Inactive inactive wala theek hai na kyuki wo to aapka kaam ka hai nahi. Ha ha pata hai pata hai ha. Theek hai. Usko delete kar denge. Ha baki.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer facing issue with wrong buyleads.

- Updated items not showing on the website.

- Wants to know about leads usage.



Resolution:

- Executive removed the wrong category for buyleads.

- Asked to share screenshots for website update issue.

- Explained leads usage.

- Advised to check website instead of preview.

- Advised to delete inactive products.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, website, product update, subscription
